channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：尼日利亚西北部的一个村庄在枪手发动袭击后几乎无人居住，这是该国最近发生的大规模绑架勒索事件。
item.description:
VIDEO: A northwest Nigerian village was left nearly unoccupied after gunmen launched an attack in the country's most recent mass abduction for ransom. pic.twitter.com/x34PSyARKq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 安东尼-戈登（Anthony Gordon）说，在实现了儿时的梦想--首次被召入英格兰队之后，他从未选择过效忠苏格兰。
item.description:
Anthony Gordon said a switch of international allegiance to Scotland was never an option after realising a childhood dream of being called up to the England squad for the first time.#AFPSports https://t.co/0JDJ0l8vhc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 印度反对党周四表示，政府冻结了反对党的银行账户，导致反对党无钱在下月开始的马拉松大选中与资金雄厚的执政党抗争。
item.description:
India's opposition said Thursday that the government's freezing of its bank accounts has left it with no money to fight the heavily funded ruling party in marathon general elections that begin next month.https://t.co/M9ssu38TLu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 在冲突双方均有数名平民丧生一天后，俄罗斯导弹和无人机发出空中警报，乌克兰首都市中心周四响起爆炸声。
item.description:
Explosions rang out in the centre of Ukraine's capital on Thursday, following air alerts prompted by Russian missiles and drones, a day after several civilians were killed on both sides of the conflict.https://t.co/jH9uV86qxY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频：新西兰老人聚在一起喝茶，完成一项重要任务：DIY 制作有朝一日他们自己使用的棺材。
item.description:
VIDEO: Elderly New Zealanders meet for cups of tea and a task of grave importance: building DIY caskets that they will one day use themselves. pic.twitter.com/ieQaOSm2bo

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 朱爱是谁？她与父亲一起监督军事演习，一系列新的信号表明，金正恩年仅十几岁的女儿可能成为朝鲜的下一任统治者。
item.description:
Who is Ju Ae? She oversees military drills with her father and a fresh slew of signals indicate Kim Jong Un's teenage daughter could be North Korea's next ruler.@AFP takes a look at what we know about her.https://t.co/gRL1GpiRSA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频：肯德基创始人桑德斯上校的塑料雕像多年来一直是迷信的日本棒球迷的幸运符。但在大阪阪神老虎队最近夺冠后，人们在处理雕像前在一座寺庙举行了感恩仪式。
item.description:
VIDEO: A plastic statue of Kentucky Fried Chicken's founder Colonel Sanders has been a lucky charm for superstitious Japanese baseball fans for years. But after Osaka's Hanshin Tigers recent win, a ritual to show gratitude is held at a temple before the disposal of the statue. pic.twitter.com/ZWAt5A0EuI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 在索非亚部分加入欧盟免签证申根区之前，反移民的错误信息如潮水般涌入保加利亚，激起了集会和排外情绪。
item.description:
A rising tide of anti-migrant misinformation has flooded Bulgaria, stoking rallies and xenophobia ahead of Sofia's partial accession to the European Union's visa-free Schengen zone.https://t.co/1Pv5AaNoyZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频：阿富汗各地学校新学年开学，女生连续第三年被禁止进入中学课堂。
item.description:
VIDEO: Schools across Afghanistan open for the new academic year, with girls lamenting being banned from joining secondary-level classes for a third year in a row. pic.twitter.com/mOBgisYeko

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 维奥莱特-查奇基（Violet Chachki）是有史以来第一位在巴黎传说中的疯马歌舞厅跳舞的男性变装皇后，她希望自己的出现能帮助 "传播 "她自己从变装中获得的 "治疗"。
item.description:
Violet Chachki is the first male-bodied drag queen ever to dance at the fabled Crazy Horse cabaret in Paris, where she hopes her appearance will help "spread the therapy" she herself got from drag.https://t.co/qkK41H4uux

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频：游客和华盛顿特区居民参观著名的潮汐盆地（Tidal Basin），樱花提前进入盛花期，这是百年来第二早的盛花期。
item.description:
VIDEO: Tourists and Washington D.C. residents visit the famed Tidal Basin as cherry blossom trees reach an early peak bloom, the second-earliest one on record in a century. pic.twitter.com/3ZN7UU6KPU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频：泰国总理沙维信（Srettha Thavisin）亲自迎接了一位不寻常的访客--一头巨大的白色水牛 Ko Muang Phet，这头水牛最近以 50 万美元的价格售出。
item.description:
VIDEO: Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin takes the bull by the horns as he welcomes an unusual visitor to his offices -- an enormous white buffalo known as Ko Muang Phet, that recently sold for $500,000. pic.twitter.com/2Ffz64o2wR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 周四，数十名被困在一艘倾覆船只生锈船体上的罗兴亚难民获救，这群难民已经脱水和晒伤，在海上漂流了一天多。
item.description:
Dozens of Rohingya refugees stranded on the rusty hull of a capsized ship were rescued Thursday after the dehydrated and sunburnt group had drifted at sea for more than a day.https://t.co/GdwplkbGZN pic.twitter.com/xVf051BtNe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频："Change The Punchline！"是首次在布加勒斯特举办的为期一个月的全女性单口相声驻场演出。其目的是鼓励新一代罗马尼亚女性喜剧演员开启自己的职业生涯。
item.description:
VIDEO: Held for the first time, "Change The Punchline!" is a month-long all-female stand-up comedy residency in Bucharest. The aim: to encourage a new generation of female Romanian comedians to kick off their career. pic.twitter.com/jdlR5TvuY3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频：鲨鱼咬人事件总体上极为罕见，科学家希望更多人了解这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟待保护的情况下。
item.description:
VIDEO: Shark bites are exceedingly rare overall, a fact scientists wish more people knew, especially amid declining shark populations desperately in need of conservation. pic.twitter.com/bThuPX7xTj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 巴勒斯坦登山者不畏战时障碍，攀登约旦河西岸的悬崖。这些登山者决心继续攀登，他们绕道以色列检查站，想方设法避免与该地区的士兵或定居者发生冲突。
item.description:
Palestinian climbers defy wartime obstacles to scale West Bank cliffs.

Determined to keep going up, the climbers have been finding detours around Israeli checkpoints and ways to avoid confrontations with soldiers or settlers in the areahttps://t.co/I19gLW3Luw pic.twitter.com/J6jEhkuZ3t

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 手抄本让人一窥几个世纪以来的墨西哥生活
item.description:
Codices offer glimpse of centuries-old Mexican lifehttps://t.co/7oIktoNGP6 pic.twitter.com/LyCGHQzuXI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频：越南檳椥省因長期熱浪和鹽水入侵導致淡水短缺，嚴重影響農作物和當地農民的生計
item.description:
VIDEO: A prolonged heatwave and saline intrusion are causing a shortage of fresh water in Vietnam's Ben Tre province, badly affecting crops and the livelihoods of local farmers pic.twitter.com/k2CfNpeaIC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: @AFP的埃马纽埃尔-杜南（Emmanuel Dunand）拍摄了工人们在巴黎塞纳河畔的卡鲁塞尔桥（Carrousel）上摆放法国艺术家丹尼尔-胡尔德（Daniel Hourde）的雕塑作品 "千声树"（L'Arbre aux Mille Voix）。
item.description:
Tree planting.@AFP’s Emmanuel Dunand photographs workers setting up a sculpture, entitled "L'Arbre aux Mille Voix" (The Tree of a Thousand Voices) by French artist Daniel Hourde on the Carrousel bridge along the Seine river in Paris.

The sculpture is a 10-meter-high tree where… pic.twitter.com/PLKFDLO5GH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚西北部的一个村庄在枪手发动袭击后几乎无人居住，这是该国最近发生的大规模绑架勒索事件：
item.description:
A northwest Nigerian village has been left nearly unoccupied after gunmen launched an attack, the country's most recent mass abduction for ransom.

Lucky escape in Nigerian kidnapping attack: https://t.co/ShcjFuvcm2 pic.twitter.com/bBH41v5XQd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 急于获得独家 Birkin 手袋的时尚人士在加利福尼亚州起诉爱马仕，理由是除非他们先购买其他奢侈品，否则爱马仕不会卖给他们。
item.description:
Fashionistas desperate to get their hands on an exclusive Birkin handbag are suing Hermes in California on grounds the company won't sell them one unless they buy other luxury products firsthttps://t.co/yTuTJAaXwy pic.twitter.com/btHrahCvgT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 世界气象组织称，在极端天气事件发生后，"由于敏感性"，"多拉 "和 "奥蒂斯 "已从太平洋飓风名单中撤销。 奥蒂略和德博拉将在轮换名单中取而代之。
item.description:
Dora, Otis retired from list of Pacific hurricane names.

World Meteorological Organization says the names have been withdrawn "because of sensitivities" following extreme weather events. Otilio and Debora will replace the names in the rotating listhttps://t.co/JGSA3embDY pic.twitter.com/4me9KGiUVl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: #澳大利亚政府表示，计划将大企业的最低税率定为 15
item.description:
#BREAKING Australia plans minimum tax rate of 15% for big business, says government pic.twitter.com/RRZmw8SvOO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频： 阿富汗：学校重新开学，女生连续第三年被拒之门外......阿富汗各地的学校已经开始了新学年的教学工作，女生们对连续第三年被禁止进入中学课堂表示遗憾。塔利班当局禁止女孩...
item.description:
VIDEO: Afghanistan: schools restart with girls barred for third year running.

Schools across Afghanistan have opened for the new academic year, with girls lamenting being banned from joining secondary-level classes for a third year in a row. Taliban authorities barred girls… pic.twitter.com/krNVdUg9Wy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: #乌克兰首都基辅市中心传出爆炸声：法新社

item.title: #台北称在台湾周围发现 32 架中国战机
item.description:
#BREAKING 32 Chinese warplanes detected around Taiwan, says Taipei pic.twitter.com/PqXvAvGqKl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 视频： 游客和华盛顿特区居民参观著名的潮汐盆地（Tidal Basin），樱花提前进入盛花期，这是百年来第二早的盛花期。
item.description:
VIDEO: Early peak bloom for cherry blossom trees in Washington spell climate change.

Tourists and Washington D.C. residents visit the famed Tidal Basin as cherry blossom trees reach an early peak bloom, the second-earliest one on record in a century pic.twitter.com/F7zEsquCPy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: 一项重要研究显示，到本世纪末，几乎所有国家的人口都将减少。 该研究警告说，发展中国家的婴儿潮和富裕国家的婴儿潮将推动巨大的社会变革。
item.description:
Global fertility rate to keep plummeting.

The population of almost every country will be shrinking by the end of the century, a major study shows. It warns that baby booms in developing nations and busts in rich ones will drive massive social changehttps://t.co/RxNJdzN88x pic.twitter.com/YyvOuYzxHs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024

item.title: #路易斯-黑山被任命为葡萄牙总理：总统府
item.description:
#BREAKING Luis Montenegro appointed Portugal prime minister: presidency pic.twitter.com/jb2GMDtjSS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 21, 2024
